page.title: 18PLASMOR CEMENT BLOCKS
page.content: {Plasmor make concrete blocks used for {building.}They produce 160 different products and make over{150,000 blocks {a day,}working 24 hours a day and 5\ days a week.They employ 130 people,50 delivering the blocks,50 making the blocks and 30 working in the offices. {Orders come from all over the North of {England.}90% of the products are delivered by Plasmor themselves in one of their fleet of 50 lorries while 10% are collected either privately or by small,local businesses. The blocks are made in one of 24 steam ovens or one of the 2 pressure ovens on site.The main ingredients for small blocks are potash and flyash from Drax and Eggborough power stations and cement.Large blocks are made using the flyash and cement along with limestone from the local Darrington Quarries.
